conversation.text: I think you might enjoy "Super" (2010) - not only does it have a great film score, but it's also a unique and imaginative take on the superhero genre. With a talented cast including Ellen Page and Kevin Bacon, "Super" is a fun and lighthearted watch that explores the power of imagination and creativity.
